processing_functions

save_ds(ds, fp, decode_coords='all', encoding=None, chunks='auto')

Save a xr.Dataset as netcdf.

Parameters

  • ds (xr.Dataset) – Dataset to save.

  • fp (str) – Path to file to create.

  • decode_coords (str, optional) – Controls which variables are set as coordinate variables when reopening the dataset, by default None.

Returns

The newly created dataset.

Return type

xr.Dataset

calc_dlat_dlon(geo_out, size_X, size_Y, lat_lon=None)

Calculated the dimensions of each pixel in meter.

Parameters

  • geo_out (list) – Geotransform function of the array.

  • size_X (int) – Number of pixels in x-direction.

  • size_Y (int) – Number of pixels in y-direction.

Returns

  • np.ndarray – Size of every pixel in the y-direction in meters.

  • dlon (array) – Size of every pixel in the x-direction in meters.
